name: World of Ghost (Tamagochi)
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 38 with theme "A Small World".

I decided to make a Tamagochi like game because I am so lazy and not powerful

Your purpose is a carrying about our little ghost and evolve him

Every 6 points of code your ghost evolve

If hungry, water or mood conditions will be equal 0, ghost will die :(
